Row.Text: I never lost a passenger, never crashed my locomotive. Not many can say the same.
So here we meet, and I got to ask myself — are you going to be my friend or my foe?
So here we meet, and I got to ask myself — are you going to be my friend or my foe?
So here we meet, and I got to ask myself — are you going to be my friend or my foe?
If I can't change your heart, I suppose I'm going to have to take you out of the way.
Y'all don't know what it's like to be shackled. So go on and do what you're gonna do, 'cause I can't die but once.
You think this ends things? You think that casting out one broken-down woman makes you a hero in the eyes of God and history?
Not too bad. Always could be better.
Yeah well, our paths got to split on this.
